mbean.name: LogGroupReader
mbean.description: Access to a local logfile group

attribute.name: FilesAvailable
attribute.description: Number of logfiles used by the Filehandler

attribute.name: FileNumber
attribute.description: Index of currently viewed logfile (0 = youngest)

attribute.name: Index
attribute.description: Position of currently viewed lines in current logfile

attribute.name: TotalLines
attribute.description: Total number of lines in current logfile

operation.name: goStart
operation.description: Jumps to start of current logfile

operation.name: goTail
operation.description: Jumps to end of current logfile - refresh view to update

operation.name: goForward
operation.description: Scrolls one page forward in current logfile

operation.name: goBackward
operation.description: Scrolls one page backward in current logfile

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Scans for new logfiles used by the FileHandler
